summary: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.
cast: Bruno Ganz|Alexandra Maria Lara|Corinna Harfouch|Ulrich Matthes|Juliane Köhler|Heino Ferch|Christian Berkel|Matthias Habich|Thomas Kretschmann|Michael Mendl|André Hennicke|Ulrich Noethen|Birgit Minichmayr|Rolf Kanies|Justus von Dohnányi|Dieter Mann|Christian Redl|Götz Otto|Thomas Limpinsel|Thomas Thieme|Alexander Held|Donevan Gunia|Bettina Redlich|Heinrich Schmieder|Anna Thalbach|Dietrich Hollinderbäumer|Ulrike Krumbiegel|Karl Kranzkowski|Thorsten Krohn|Jürgen Tonkel|Devid Striesow|Fabian Busch|Christian Hoening|Aleksandr Slastin|Alina Sokar|Amelie Menges|Charlotte Stoiber|Gregory Borlein|Julia Bauer|Laura Borlein|Andrey Blagoslovenski|Dirk Borchardt|Elizaveta Boyarskaya|Michael Brandner|I. title: El hundimiento
